Included in this version (if it really is Limited Ed.)

- "Forza Motorsport VIP Membership", which will "entitle gamers to special treatment at the game's auction house, community storefront, and on the game's official forums."

- 5 cars, "available only through your VIP membership"

- "Exclusive Collector's Edition Car Pack", which is five cars that have been "hand tuned and hand painted by the developers at Turn 10"

FEB 17 2011 - Hey All I have tested this and checked stealth and have successfully run it on LIVE with Ixtreme lite.... no probs so far :)

Works perfectly!! 

To answer some questions below..... you do need both discs to have all the cars and tracks available.... However .... do what I did = Grab the disc 1 and test and burn it ... you will be amazed ... then do the second disc to add all the features.

Personal favourite of the game = REWIND TO WHERE YOU STUFFED UP AND GET IT RIGHT, WITHOUT HAVING TO RESTART THE RACE.... IF ONLY GT HAD THOUGHT OF THAT. cheers!
